newsitem.title: UK: BHF-Bank sets two 100 mln mark structured FRNs. [CORRECTED 10:50 GMT]
newsitem.headline: BHF-Bank sets two 100 mln mark structured FRNs. [CORRECTED 10:50 GMT]

text.p: BHF-Bank has launched two 100 million mark five-year FRNs for itself in the name of Security Against Vague Euro, the bank said on Wednesday.
TYPE A
AMT 100 MLN MARK BASE 6M LIBOR MATURITY 28.DEC.02
TYPE STRUCTURED MARGIN *-100 BP PAY DATE 16.JUL.97
FULL FEES UNDISC ISS PRICE 99.60
NOTES BONDS EXCHANGEABLE AT DISCRETION OF BOND HOLDER
ON 28.DEC.98 INTO NOMINAL $540 PER 1,000 DEM BOND.
*UP TO 27.DEC.98 THEREAFTER SIX MONTH DOLLAR LIBOR
FLAT IF EXCHANGED OR SIX MONTH DEM LIBOR FLAT IF
NOT.
(Corrects exchange date to 28.DEC.98 from 28.JUN.02.)
TYPE B
AMT 100 MLN MARK BASE 6M LIBOR MATURITY 28.DEC.02
TYPE STRUCTURED MARGIN *+100 BP PAY DATE 16.JUL.97
FULL FEES UNDISC ISS PRICE 99.60
NOTES BONDS EXCHANGEABLE AT DISCRETION OF BOND HOLDER
ON 28.DEC.98 INTO NOMINAL $540 PER 1,000 DEM BOND.
*UP TO 27.DEC.98 THEREAFTER SIX MONTH DOLLAR LIBOR
FLAT IF EXCHANGED OR SIX MONTH DEM LIBOR FLAT IF
NOT.
(Corrects exchange date to 28.DEC.98 from 28.JUN.02.)
IF US DOLLAR EXCHANGE RATE IS 1.6300 DEM OR LOWER ON 21.DEC.98 EACH
NOMINAL 1,000 DEM BOND NOT EXCHANGED BEFORE BY THE BONDHOLDER WILL BE EXCHANGED BY THE ISSUER TO NOMINAL $613.
COMMON TERMS:
LISTING FFURT DENOMS (K) ONE
NEG PLG NO CRS DEFLT NO
-- London Newsroom +44 171 542 7658
